comments: Do not take chemistry with Heather price. It is one of the most confusing and frustrating experiences ever. I am not sure why the reviews are so good but I believe it is because she is nice and the class is easy so students do not notice that you actually don\'t learn very much.

Dr. Price loves Chemistry and it really shows! Especially when she goes on about pollution. It\'s really interesting to watch. The pre-lab and post-lab work became tedious after three quarters but you get use to it. If I was to take chemistry, I would definitely take it with her. Dr. Price wants people to succeed. That\'s the difference.
Great teacher. Dr. Price will prepare you very well for the general chem series. Giving out alot of handouts that are very helpful.If you go everyday she prepares you very well before every exam.
awesome instructor. She also tries her best to help every student.I would recommend her if you tend to take Chem161, 162, 163 at Highline CC.

I\'m enjoying her class but her lectures are all over the place and scrambled. Chemistry is difficult enough as it is and she makes it harder. The hw takes you hours and is worth like nothing! You need to work very hard in her class. I have to learn basically everything from the book.

Dr. Price was a great teacher though I sometimes I was lost due to my limited chemistry knowledge. She was very approachable and really cared whether you understood it or not. I would take a class from her again if I could.
She really cares about her students. Class is not easy but it\'s not too hard!

Dr. Price is intelligent and friendly, but like others have stated, she does expect a lot from her students. Made the class very interesting, labs were also fun. I like her as a teacher, but the course content was difficult. Lots of calculations, which you should definitely expect on the exams.

It\'s unfortunate when teachers like this teach a class everyone needs. Treats the workload as if she is the only class. If you work full time, forget it. Gives a list of curriculum rather than making an actual test review. Posts material late online. She may not be aware she is teaching adults rather than children.

she sucks. we had four snow days that canceled class and so she decided to fit in two whole chapters plus another portion of a chapter into two days, then gave us a whole day to study the new material+old material for the final. ONE DAY TO LEARN NEW MATERIAL+OLD. RIDICULOUS. HER FAVORITE QUOTE "THIS SHOULD ALL BE REVIEW"....Right.

Dr. Price is definitely one of the easiest teacher I have taken at HCC. She explains her labs thoroughly, and she really enjoys clarifying materials for students. Her tests are pretty easy too. Its very much identical to her old exams that she posts on angel; only the numbers on the test changes.

Dr. Price is a good professor, she is very nice and always helpful. The only down fall is that her practice exams don\'t follow the exams she give in class. It\'s just more work for you to do. And also her exams are too long. way to long. If you know the material yet don\'t have enough time to finish then too bad for you. Great, but exams are to long.
Great instructor :D! She is a sweetheart and very nice. Her tests are based on the material from class, so no tricks (yay). She also tries her best to help every student.

Dr. Price teaches clearly and effectively. You will learn chemistry based on her lectures. The only downside to her class is the tests. Dr. Price will test you on pretty much everything from the book. I\'ve taken other chemistry professors at Highline and Dr. Price\'s tests are just as difficult if not more difficult than other professor\'s.

Dr. Price is always willing to help students, her lectures help clarify the textbook and her tests are challenging but if you study at least 1 hour everery night easy A. SUPER NICE TEACHER i would take her for the whole series
Great Prof!! Take her class.

Love her!She is the best professor of chem after owens.But she is great!Im taking her for all 3 series of 151, 152, and 153.She makes everything so understandable.Would recommend her to anyone cuz she is great!But one downside is,a lot of HW is required. But she gives 1 week or 1 1/2 week to do it.There are like 25-30 probs..easy grade doesnt check

Awesome chemistry instructor! Provided crystal clear explanations of the concepts and consistently had a straightforward schedule for assignment due dates. Chemistry is no easy subject to learn in itself, but she\'s always ready to help when you need it. I would highly reccommend her!
Sorry didnt want to give her that green face, i meant smiley face. She is nice, easy and helpful.
She is nice. If you have problems with chem, take her class because its an easiest chem profs at the HCC.
